sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Button } from '../ButtonElement' import { InfoContainer, InfoWrapper, InfoRow, Column1, Column2, TextWrapper, TopLine, Heading, Subtitle, BtnWrap, Img, ImgWrap } from './InfoElements' const InfoSection = ({ lightBg, id, imgStart,topLine,lightText,headLine,darkText,description,buttonLabel,img,alt}) => { return ( <> {topLine} {headLine} {description} ) } export default InfoSection
